original: / $VALUE|H%0$ ( Deployment max experience depends on amount of equipment )
translation: / $VALUE|H%0$ （单位部署时的最大经验值取决于装备的数量）

original: \nIf training is completed, this unit will gain enough experience to be deployed as level $NUMBER$ ( $MAXLEVEL|%Y0$ ) giving it a combat modifier of $EFFECT|+=%0$
translation: \n当训练完成时，该单位所积攒的经验使它在部署时等级为$NUMBER$($MAXLEVEL|%Y0$)并获得$EFFECT|+=%0$的战斗修正

original: \n If this unit is fully equipped training will be finished on §Y$DATE$§!
translation: \n 如果该单位装备齐全，则可以在§Y$DATE$§!完成训练

original: We can train at most $CAP|*H$ men.\nCapped by max manpower in the field ( $RATIO|H0%$ of $INFIELD|*H$. Minimum: $MINPOSSIBLE|*H$ men)
translation: 我们最多可以训练$CAP|*H$人。\n这是由我们的最大作战人数所限制的 ( $INFIELD|*H$中的$RATIO|H0%$。最小人数为$MINPOSSIBLE|*H$人)

original: You cannot delete your last template.
translation: 你无法删除上一个编制。

original: Are you sure to delete this template?
translation: 你确定要删除这个编制吗？

original: Cannot §RDeploy§! a unit that does not have any equipment.\nPlease wait until this deployment receives some equipment.
translation: 无法§R部署§!没有任何装备的单位。\n请等到该单位得到一定装备后再进行部署。

original: Cannot §RDeploy§! a unit that doesn't have any men.
translation: 无法§R部署§!没有任何成员的单位。

original: Cannot §RDeploy§! a unit that that isn't at least $VALUE|1H%$ trained (Current $CURRENT|1R%$)
translation: 无法§R部署§!没有达到$VALUE|1H%$训练度的单位(目前为$CURRENT|1R%$)

original: Cannot §RDeploy§! a unit that would put us over the special forces limit
translation: 不能§R部署§!会导致我们超出特种部队上限的单位

original: Select deployment(s) from the list, and then §Gclick§! on the highlighted provinces on the map to deploy.\n§gUnits deployed with incomplete equipment will fetch them through the reinforcement requests.\nConsider that units deployed too early will not get the proper training.§!
translation: 在列表中选择准备好部署的单位，并在地图上§G点击§!高亮的省份部署。\n§g在部署时没有装备齐全的单位将通过增援获得余下的装备。\n请注意，过早部署的单位将不会得到充分的训练。§!

original: §TSet priority for equipment going to reinforce active troops compared to deployment queue and upgrades§!
translation: §T设定优先度，让新生产的装备相对部署队列和升级更优先增援现役部队§!
§G目前没有单位需要额外装备。§!

original: §TSet priority for equipment going to upgrade active troops compared to deployment queue and reinforcements§!
translation: §T设定优先度，让新生产的装备相对部署队列和部队增援更优先供应给正在升级的部队§!

original: §TSet priority for equipment that will support this diplomatic activity.§!
translation: §T优先生产这项外交活动所需的装备。§!

original: §RCannot delete this Template. Country does not contain this Template.§!
translation: §R无法删除该编制。我国没有该编制。§!

original: §RCannot delete this Template because $AMOUNT|H$ Division(s) are using it.§!
translation: §R因为有$AMOUNT|H$个单位在使用该编制，所以无法删除。§!

original: §RCannot delete this Template because $AMOUNT|H$ Division(s) are transitioning from this template to new one (Waiting for receiving equipment matching new template).§!
translation: §R由于有$AMOUNT|H$个单位正在从该编制改编为新编制，所以无法删除该编制(请等待单位收到符合新编制的装备)。§!

original: Cannot §RRemove§! this template from the country. Country has $AMOUNT|H$ deployments using this template.
translation: 无法在我国§R删除§!这个编制。我国有$AMOUNT|H$个待部署单位正在使用该编制。

original: Units with this template will receive equipment last and at lowest priority once deployed. Perfect for units set to guard bases and such.
translation: 使用这种编制的单位在部署队列中将最后得到装备，在部署后装备增援的优先级也是最低。适合让基地卫戍部队等单位使用。

original: Units with this template get average priority for equipment and reinforcement once deployed.
translation: 使用这种编制的单位在部署队列中获得装备以及在部署后获得装备增援的优先级都是普通。

original: Units with this template will receive equipment before anyone else once deployed and at highest priority. Use for your best men and where they can do the most good.
translation: 使用这种编制的单位在部署队列中将最早获得装备，在部署后得到装备增援的优先级也最高。给你最精锐的部队使用这种编制，让他们能够发挥出最大的作用。

original: Adds another unit of $CONVEYOR|H$ to be produced in parallel.\n\n§GShift+Click§! to add 5 lines
translation: 添加一个 $CONVEYOR|H$ 单位，让它和之前的单位并列生产。\n\n按§GShift+点击§!一次添加5条部署队列

original: Type here to change deployment generic name.
translation: 在这里编辑部署单位的通用名。

original: This deployment creates divisions using $TEMPLATE|H$ template.
translation: 这一次部署的单位使用的是$TEMPLATE|H$编制。

original: Does not have any deployment ready to §RDeploy§!.
translation: 没有任何单位准备好§R部署§!。

original: Are you sure that you want to §RCancel§! production of all deployment lines?
translation: 你确定你要§R取消§!所有部署队列的生产吗？

original: Are you sure that you want to §RCancel§! producing this deployment line?\n(Deployment will be also §RRemoved§!)
translation: 你确定你要§R取消§!这一条部署队列的生产吗？\n(已部署单位也会同时被§R去除§!)

original: Are you sure that you want to §RCancel§! producing this deployment line?
translation: 你确定要§R取消§!这一条部署队列的生产吗？

original: §GClick§! to assign deployment to order.\n§GRight-click§! to reset order assignment.
translation: §G点击§!给单位分配战斗任务。\n§G右键点击§!将重新为该单位分配战斗任务。

original: Deployment should have at least one order within theater to be assigned to any group.
translation: 为了将单位编入组织，必须给他分配至少一个战斗任务。

original: Deployment should have target location to be assigned to any group.
translation: 为了将单位编入组织，必须给他分配一个目标地点。

original: §GClick§! to set deployment location for this deployment.\n§GRight-click§! to reset location.
translation: §G点击§!选择单位部署的位置。\n§G右键点击§!重置位置。

original: §GClick§! to set deployment location for this deployment.\n§GRight-click§! to reset location.\n§YThis is colonial template and can be deployed only in the country of origin!§!
translation: §G点击§!设定部署位置。\n§G右键点击§!重置位置。\n§Y这是殖民地编制，只能部署在来源国！§!

original: Type here to change current line prefix.
translation: 在此编辑该部署队列的前缀。

original: Increase the number of serial training of divisions that each line will complete.\n\nSetting to infinite means each line will train a new division when a previous one is deployed.
translation: 增加每一条部署队列将依次训练的部队数量。\n\n将这一值设为无限意味着每一条队列都将在训练并部署上一支部队后开始训练下一支部队。

original: This is the amount of divisions that each line will train before being removed.\n\nSetting to infinite means each line will train a new division when a previous one is deployed.
translation: 该数字代表该队列在被去除前将会训练的部队数量。\n\n将这一值设为无限意味着每一条队列都将在训练并部署上一支部队后开始训练下一支部队。

original: Decrease the number of serial training of divisions that each line will complete.\n\nSetting to infinite means each line will train a new division when a previous one is deployed.
translation: 减少每一条部署队列将依次训练的部队数量。\n\n将这一值设为无限意味着每一条队列都将在训练并部署上一支部队后开始训练下一支部队。

original: §RNot enough manpower or equipment to train $DIVS|H$ of the divisions§!
translation: §R没有足够的人力或者装备训练其中的$DIVS|H$个师§!

original: §GClick§! to move up\n§GShift+Click§! to move to top
translation: §G点击§!向上移动\n§GShift+点击§!移动到顶部

original: §GClick§! to move down\n§GShift+Click§! to move to bottom
translation: §G点击§!向下移动\n§GShift+点击§!移动到底部

original: Target location is §RInvalid§! for deployment now.
translation: 目标位置目前§R无法§!部署单位。

original: Training of this line is not finished yet.
translation: 该队列的训练还未完成。

original: Current series number of deployment in the line.
translation: 该单位在当前队列中的顺序。

original: §HErase custom name.§!\nWill try to restore the originally assigned name, unless it's already taken.
translation: §H移除自定义番号。§!\n会试图恢复原先的番号，如果尚未分给其他部队。

original: §HChoose another historical name.§!\n§GClick§! to open a list of all historical names still available. It is possible to change the group of the names by editing the template.
translation: §H选择另一个史实番号。§!\n§G点击§!打开目前仍未使用的史实番号。想更改番号分组的话可以通过修改编制实现。

original: §GClick§! and type, to use a custom name.
translation: §G点击§!之后可以输入自定义番号。

original: Cannot train new special template units.
translation: 无法训练新的特种部队编制单位。

original: Cannot change to this template because that would case us to exceed our special forces cap
translation: 无法更改编制，因为这会导致我们超出特种部队上限

original: This template does not contain any special forces
translation: 这个编制不含特种部队

original: This template contains $NUM|Y$ special forces battalions
translation: 这个编制含有$NUM|Y$个特种部队营

original: You are currently fielding $USED|Y$ and training $IN_TRAINING|Y$ of our $CAP|Y$ allowed special forces battalions
translation: 我们最多可以拥有$CAP|Y$个特种部队营，你当前部署了$USED|Y$个，正在训练$IN_TRAINING|Y$个

original: This leaves room for $TRAINABLE|Y$ division(s) using this template.
translation: 这为$TRAINABLE|Y$个师可以使用这个编制提供了可能。
